section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on October 13, 2024.*
section.heading: Central Washington activation projects— temporary tax abatement – Rules.
section.text: The Mayor may, pursuant to Subchapter 1 of Chapter 5 of Title 2, issue rules to implement §§ 47-870 through 47-870.01.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 2052(b) of Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-506, July 15, 2024, 71 DCR 8406).
